thread.section_title: Hotel Augustin - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Enjoyed our staying!
thread.title_full: Enjoyed our staying! - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michael T
title: Enjoyed our staying!
text: Great hotel, great people. Just loved it for a lot of reasons. First of all the persons working there are very kind and helpfull. The breakfast was very nice. The rooms were cleaned every day and the towels changed also every day. Used the mini bar everyday for free! Drunk everyday our coffee and ate cakes for free in our hotel and other hotels which were under the astotel franchise. Near Saint Augustin mestro station.I fully recommend it! Book it without a doubt!
